directions: Place lavender flowers in an empty ice cube tray; pour boiling water over flowers. Place ice cube tray in the refrigerator to cool, about 15 minutes. Transfer to freezer and freeze until solid, about 3 hours.
Fill a glass with ice. Pour Collins mix and gin over ice; stir. Top drink with a lavender ice cube and garnish with maraschino cherries.
title: Lavender Tom Collins
